io.github.kushnirvladyslav

Class ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscriber
      • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.ProcessingListEventSubscriber
        • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchEventSubscriber

    public abstract class ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber
extends ProcessingListEventSubscriber
    Abstract base class for subscribers that process lists of events with error handling capabilities. Extends ProcessingListEventSubscriber by adding error handling and statistics tracking.

    This class maintains:

    • Error handlers for specific event types
    • Error statistics including total error count
    • Information about the last occurred error
    Since:
    2025-07-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vladyslav Kushnir
    See Also:
    ProcessingListEventSubscriber, EventErrorHandler

    • Method Detail

      • subscribeEvent

        public <T extends Event<?>> void subscribeEvent(Class<T> eventType,
                                                ListEventsHandler<T> handler,
                                                EventErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Registers both normal and error handlers for a specific event type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of events to handle
        Parameters:
        eventType - the class object representing the event type
        handler - the handler for processing lists of events of the specified type
        errorHandler - the handler for processing errors during event handling

      • processEvent

        protected <T extends Event<?>> void processEvent(ListEvents<T> event)
        Processes a ListEvents instance with error handling. If an exception occurs during processing, it's handled by the appropriate error handler.
        Overrides:
        processEvent in class ProcessingListEventSubscriber
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of events in the list
        Parameters:
        event - the ListEvents instance containing the events to process

      • unsubscribeEvent

        public void unsubscribeEvent(Class<?>... eventsType)
        Unregisters both normal and error handlers for the specified event types.
        Overrides:
        unsubscribeEvent in class ProcessingListEventSubscriber
        Parameters:
        eventsType - the event types to unregister

      • clearSubscribeEvents

        public void clearSubscribeEvents()
        Removes all registered event and error handlers.
        Overrides:
        clearSubscribeEvents in class ProcessingListEventSubscriber

      • handleException

        protected <T extends Event<?>> void handleException(ListEvents<T> event,
                                                    Exception exception)
        Handles exceptions that occur during event processing. Updates error statistics and delegates to the appropriate error handler if one exists.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of events in the list
        Parameters:
        event - the ListEvents instance that caused the exception
        exception - the exception that occurred

      • getTotalErrorCount

        public long getTotalErrorCount()
        Returns the total number of errors that have occurred.
        Returns:
        the total error count

      • getLastFailedEvent

        public Event<?> getLastFailedEvent()
        Returns the last event that failed during processing.
        Returns:
        the last failed event, or null if no errors have occurred

      • getLastException

        public Exception getLastException()
        Returns the last exception that occurred during event processing.
        Returns:
        the last exception, or null if no errors have occurred

        public void clearErrorStatistics()
        Clears all error statistics, including error count and last error information.
